frontmatter.title: What A Campfire Can Teach You About Marketing
frontmatter.description: Having the right tools (in this case - rocks) for any job is very important! For business owners online their website is one of the most important tools to have in their arsenal.

frontmatter.title: Do Nothing, And Be More Productive
frontmatter.description: Sometimes the best solution for solving a problem or just being more productive is to just walk away and quiet your mind. Take some time every day and just do nothing. Here are a few ways to...
